attributes.action: Protect the interests of British farming against such advertising as the current New Zealand Anchor Butter campaign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the imported New Zealand Anchor butter company is describing itself as "The Free Range Butter Company", and has hoardings with the mendacious statement "Only Our cows are free to roam".
This statement is wholly untrue. British farmers do not prevent their dairy herds from grazing freely. In New Zealand intensive grazing methods are in vogue, whereby cows are contained in a relatively small area, and moved on after a few days when that area of grazing is exhausted. This is done to be "efficient". It is not the same as free range because it is not free!
Britsh animal wefare standards are without doubt the highest in the world, and British farmers and dairies do deserve slanderous allegations being levelled at them.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
